sn31.23-112:1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn31.23-112:1.3: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sāragandhe adhivatthānaṃ devānaṃ …pe…
sn31.23-112:1.12: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena sucaritaṃ carati, vācāya sucaritaṃ carati, manasā sucaritaṃ carati.
sn31.23-112:1.16: ‘aho vatāhaṃ kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā gandhagandhe adhivatthānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjeyyan’ti.
sn31.23-112:1.27: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā gandhagandhe adhivatthānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati.
sn31.23-112:1.28: Ayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṃ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā gandhagandhe adhivatthānaṃ devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjatī”ti.
sn31.23-112:2.1: (Evaṃ piṇḍakena ekasatañca dvādasa ca suttantā honti.)
